html: FactCheck - @RepTomSuozzi claims no simplification in @GOPTaxCuts. Wrong. 28 mil taxpayers don’t need to itemize to get full tax relief. 4.5 mil taxpayers no longer doing taxes twice for AMT. #smallbiz no longer keeping complex deprecation schedules. 4-7% less time/cost.
